revised_title: Improving Levelling Instruments for Accurate River and Sea Level Measurements
tldr: The author, John Augustus Lloyd, designed and improved a leveling instrument to accurately measure the difference in levels between the River Thames and the sea. He described the details of the instrument, its adjustments, and the techniques used for precise measurements. This work contributed to the understanding of river and sea levels, as well as the improvement of surveying techniques.
